DLG SPR_0

"""
its a magnifying glass..
u never use it but u suppose all good detectives have one
"""

maybe you shud clean the scattered old case files
just a suggestion
"""

im ur desk

DLG SPR_5
"""
{sequence
  - you shudn't be here! this is a crime scene!
  - what?! me?! I'M AN OFFICER OF THE LAW!
  - HEY! LEAVE YOU WANNABE P.I.!!
  - {shk}I'M GONNA CALL MY BOSS ON U!!!!{shk}
}
"""

DLG SPR_6
"""
{
  - {item "0"} == 1 ?
    oh.. you have a magnifying glass? big deal
  - else ?
    plz leave.. i dont want to be yelled at by my boss
}
"""

DLG SPR_7

{sequence
  - heck! ITS A CORPSE!!
  - oh wait u see these a lot why are u even surprised? loser
  - a corpse is a corpse
  - i think it was stabbed with a pen.. maybe the killer is an office worker (LOL)
}
"""

DLG SPR_9

{sequence
  - what are you doing here? this is off limits!
  - I SAID THIS IS OFF LIMITS!!
  - I WILL ARREST U AS A TRESPASSER!!
}
"""

{

    the method of murder appears to be very sharp claws! they have been scratched to death!

}

END 0
YOU DID IT! WOW! U CAUGHT THE REAL KILLER! TURNS OUT UR KITTY PERIWINKLE TRULY IS A MEAN JERK LIKE U ALREADY KNEW! THEY ARE JUST A MURDEROUS JERK TOO! GOOD JOB FIGURING IT OUT! TURNS OUT MAGNIFYING GLASSES ARE GOOD FOR SOMETHING!

END undefined

END undefinee
